description: Create a project transport plan stop.
permissions: Create is delegated to the related project transport plan. Project transport plan permissions delegate to the project; users need project update permissions (admin or practically manager of the project developer organization) to create a stop.
side_effects: If changed_by_id is set, after commit the plan transport orders may be marked as managed. After create, the project external TMS movement number may be set from managed transport orders when created_by_id is present.
validation_notes: --project-transport-plan and --project-transport-location are required. Status must be one of: planned, started, finished, cancelled. Project transport location must belong to the same broker as the project transport plan. Project transport location must be valid for stops.

flags.name: status
flags.validation: One of: planned, started, finished, cancelled.
